content.description: Evaluate your skill of using Random (2016 Fall, Final, Question 11)

p.line: A coin has two sides, labeled "1" and "2". Consider the goal of simulating the results of flipping the coin _EMPHS_five_EMPHE_ times, and displaying the _EMPHS_sum_EMPHE_ from the five flips. Which of the following code segments will produce the appropriate results? Hint: Compare the # of ways there are of summing to 5 vs. 7â€¦ (select ONE)

content.hint: Adding up the result of N calls to "pick-random(1)to(M)" is not equivalent with N times the result of one "pick-random(1)to(M)".
